title: Boutique Tropical Escape in the Daintree Rainforest Overlooking the Mossman River
description: Nestled among the Daintree Rainforest on the banks of the gently flowing Mossman River, Silky Oaks Lodge is a hidden gem of Tropical North Queensland. Contemporary luxury meets pristine nature at this renowned hideaway. Connect with the natural world on another level and spend each day discovering another piece of this paradise - from exploring the UNESCO World Heritage-listed rainforest and learning about the rich, cultural heritage of the local First Nations people, to snorkelling the stunning Great Barrier Reef. After the dayâ€™s adventures, indulge in culinary delights as you taste your way through the Treehouse Restaurant's modern Australian menu, with ingredients sourced from the kitchen garden and local producers.
